headline: From chips to couture: Baillie Gifford explains top long-term stock picks
summary: Baillie Gifford’s Mark Urquhart breaks down his AI portfolio strategy — explaining why he’s steering clear of memory stocks and instead backing companies that are “very hard to replicate” across multiple industries. He also names some of his preferred luxury goods stocks.

headline: Stocks to Watch Monday: Alphabet, XPeng, Tesla
summary: ↗️ Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL): Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A, BRK.B) added Google's parent company to its portfolio last quarter and further shrunk its stake in Apple (AAPL). Alphabet shares jumped more than 5% in premarket trading.

headline: Amazon seeks $12B in bond sale, Netflix trades after stock split
summary: Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman tracks several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including Amazon (AMZN) seeking to raise $12 billion through a US bond sale, Chinese EV maker XPeng (XPEV, 9868.HK) published revenue outlook that fell below Wall Street's expectations, and Netflix (NFLX) stock is currently trading after its 10-for-1 stock split. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Netflix stock briefly showed a 90% decline. Don't worry, it's a stock split.
summary: Netflix (NFLX) shares briefly showed a 90% decline Monday morning. It's because of the streaming giant's 10-for-1 stock split. "Free-for-all" artificial intelligence announcement helps Alibaba (BABA, 9988.HK) rebound after a tough week, while tensions between China and Japan affect stocks including Shiseido. Finally, here's why Clearwater Analytics (CWAN) is soaring. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance. Editor's note: The headline and post were updated to reflect Netflix's stock split.
